entry.title: The Ted Mosby Method
entry.summary:
Author: CancerCadaver

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,587Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: “Cool, right? It’s pretty easy, you just…” Eddie continued talking, but all that Buck could hear was the sound of his pulse racing in his ears as he looked up at Eddie. Eddie, who had always been there for him, even while he had been living in another state. Eddie, who had never made him feel like he didn’t matter, and had always been there for him when he needed him. Eddie, who had trusted him with his son over anyone else, and who he would trust with his entire life, his entire person. And Eddie, whose arms were wrapped around Buck’s back, the only thing keeping him from falling on the ground.Eddie brought him back up, but the feelings swimming in his head didn’t disperse, but only became stronger, as he was back within range of Eddie, to feel his breath on him, to study every feature of Eddie’s face. God, he wished he could stay there forever, memorizing every little detail.I’m just a fool, a fool in love with you.“Holy shit, I think I’m in love with you.”--or, the one where eddie slow dances with buck and buck confesses hes in love with eddie

entry.title: The Chosen and the Cursed
entry.summary:
Author: ThisGayGeek22

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,165Chapters: 4/15Kudos: 19

Summary: A solar eclipse marks the beginning.A fire changes everything.And one impossible moment shatters the illusion of normalcy.When Buck is gravely injured during a rescue, something ancient stirs—something buried deep in his blood. As his body begins to heal at a rate no doctor can explain, the 118 is pulled into a world of magic, secrets, and destiny.Eddie feels the shift too—power waking in his bones, in his blood. And the bond between him and Buck? It was never just friendship. Not really.As the veil between worlds thins, Buck and Eddie must confront the truth of who they are—what they were always meant to be—and the powerful connection tying them together.This was never just an accident.It was the beginning.

entry.title: Through Fire and Time II (9-1-1 x 9-1-1: Lone Star Fanfic)
entry.summary:
Author: actuallynate

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,193Chapters: 6/31Kudos: 11

Summary: Same number, different city.Elliot "Eli" Hayes thought he had found stability and belonging with the 126 in Austin - a firehouse that helped him heal from his past and grow into his role as a paramedic. But life, as unpredictable as ever, throws him a curveball when a sudden reshuffle forces him to temporarily leave the comfort of the firehouse family and take up a position with the 118 in Los Angeles.Returning to his hometown stirs up old memories, unresolved grief, and unexpected challenges. With his panic disorder still a lingering shadow, Eli must navigate the dynamic and high-pressure environment of the 118 while proving himself to a new team.Meanwhile, his close friend, Ravi Panikkar, struggles to find his footing at the 252 firehouse in New York under the shadow of Captain Sal Deluca, a once respected leader whose toxic ways threaten to unravel Ravi's confidence and safety.TRIGGER WARNING: This story contains themes of panic disorder, hypochondria, and anxiety attacks, as well as references to trauma, medical procedures, suicide, drug names and high-stress emergency situations. Reader discretion is advised.

entry.title: homesick for places i've never been before
entry.summary:
Author: andtimestoodstill

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,766Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: So there he was, doomscrolling through Reels of adorable dogs in need of a good home that Buck could very well provide if there wasn't something so fundamentally unlovable about him, when Eddie's contact picture appeared on his screen requesting a FaceTime call. Eddie usually checked in before calling, though that was a formality more than anything. Buck was always going to drop everything and answer Eddie's calls, but he did take a moment to turn off the TV and un-slump himself from the couch cushions before doing so. Ever since Eddie had left, Buck felt like he was walking around without his left hand, not completely helpless but certainly at a disadvantage. But even just the two-dimensional rendering of Eddie on his phone screen settled something in Buck, almost like he was whole again. Almost. (Or, Eddie calls, Buck answers)

entry.title: You picked up the pieces (and turned them into a heart)
entry.summary:
Author: Mila_Enefee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,817Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 129

Summary: Evan almost admits to his mom that he is bisexual when Athena catches Michael cheating with a man and a huge scandal breaks out. Evan was never afraid that his mom wouldn't accept him, but now? Deep down, he understands that she will love him in any way, but every time he tries to confess, he panics. So Evan decides not to say anything.Things get complicated when he meets Tim Bradford, a police officer who works with his mom. However, they date for almost six months before Tim breaks his heart into pieces.Desperate and furious, Evan joins the army and meets Eddie Diaz there.Meanwhile, Daniel and Maddie Buckley live their lives until they find out something.

entry.title: People don't leave people if they really are in love
entry.summary:
Author: hxlfbloodprincess

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,207Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 82

Summary: Lucy knew she was going to be stood up, that was just how internet dates went. It didn’t really matter. The date wasn’t exactly the point. It was more about the dating. Sure, that sounded like the exact same thing, but the two were fundamentally different. At least to Lucy. She was still getting used to the idea of not dating Tim if she was completely honest with herself, and this was risk-free. Firehose was not going to show up.ORLucy is trying to get over Tim and Buck is trying to move on after Eddie moved to Texas. Somehow their paths cross and while sparks may not exactly be flying, maybe there's something else between them? Maybe they could be friends?

entry.title: Haunted by the ghost of you
entry.summary:
Author: Bumblebee2020

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,611Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Evan Buckley has always been able to see ghosts, to the point if it weren't for his sister he would've been medicated.He meets Eddie Diaz when he's 22, they fall in love at 26, Eddie Diaz dies at 30 years old when a structure collapses."I can't see him Maddie, I...""Christopher?" Buck shakes his head as the weight in his chest grows. "You think maybe..."Buck shook his head harshly."No, he wouldn't without saying goodbye.... I haven't seen any of them since he died... it's like the world went quiet.""Buck..." Christopher whimpers as he walks into the living room. "I can't..."Buck nods and hugs him too, tight against his chest.~"I'm still here..."

entry.title: This Place Could Be Beautiful, Right? You Could Make This Place Beautiful.
entry.summary:
Author: Mariereads167

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,091Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: Life is no longer the same for Eddie and Buck. The last seven years of comfort and familiarity are threatened to be washed away and in its place now is a physical seperation by hundred of miles.But alas, they trudge on.Buck learns how to love himself amidst loneliness and how to let that be enough.Eddie grapples with his shifting identity and what it means to be unsure of yourself in a world that seems to be so unforgiving.Both men find love in one another and in their diverging lives. And even in the weeks and months to come, as they make their way back to one another, they realize that loving themselves is the only foundation their relationship can rest on.OR: Buck remains in LA with his lingering feelings in this new chapter of his life without Eddie by his side.Eddie is in Texas working on his relationship with Christopher.When you are a parent, you are trying to sell the world to your children.‘Any decent realtor, walking you through a shithole, chirps on about good bones.'And both Buck and Eddie realize that to love the world, they must first love who they are in it.

entry.title: Eddie, My Love
entry.summary:
Author: pretty_boy_buckley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,626Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 83

Summary: “Ev,” Eddie’s soft voice had tears immediately welling in his eyes. He turned to face him.Wait for me, he wanted Eddie to say, I’ll come back for you.Please ask me to wait for you.Eddie swallowed hard, sucking in a slow, deep breath.Please. Please ask me to wait for you.“Write to me?”orBuck and Eddie meet just days before Eddie is set to be deployed.

entry.title: That’s what you do when you love someone.
entry.summary:
Author: SavSmiles22

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,896Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 254

Summary: Eddie is finally settling into El Paso life when a call from Chimney sends a lot of well controlled emotions spiraling.OrEddie picks up the phone attempting to keep his voice light in hopes of easing the sinking feeling he has. “Hey Chim what’s up?”Chimney’s tone was clipped as he responded, “it’s about Buck.”“Is…is he okay?..” Eddie couldn’t tell if his heart was beating to fast or not at all.“Yes and no.” Chim just sounded exhausted now, “Look man I know you got obligations in Texas. But he needs you right now…their dad died 2 days ago…”
